metadata.title: Stellar Regions Database
metadata.description: Areas of human expansion and territorial control in local space
metadata.coordinate_system: Galactic coordinates with distance from Sol in parsecs

regions.name: Human Core
regions.description: The central core of human civilization centered on Sol, including the oldest colonies and core worlds.
regions.significance: Core human territory including Sol, Alpha Centauri, and primary colonies

regions.name: Protelan Trade Corridor
regions.description: Key trade route dominated by the Protelani Republic, connecting rimward systems to the core.
regions.significance: Primary rimward trade corridor, Protelani Republic stronghold

regions.name: Felgenland Rim
regions.description: Rimward territories controlled by the Felgenland Union, known for independence and trade prosperity.
regions.significance: Felgenland Union territory, Eclipse Festival worlds, trade hub

regions.name: Anti-Driftward Contested Zone
regions.description: Disputed territory below the galactic plane, site of frequent conflicts between major powers.
regions.significance: Contested space, frequent territorial disputes, strategic resources

regions.name: Spinward Expanse
regions.description: Expanding frontier region in the direction of galactic rotation, site of new colonies and exploration.
regions.significance: Active colonization front, new world development, frontier spirit

regions.name: Anti-Spinward Fringe
regions.description: Remote frontier region opposite to galactic rotation, sparsely populated with isolated outposts.
regions.significance: Remote frontier, independent settlements, exploration outposts

regions.name: Trailing Void
regions.description: Vast region with sparse stellar density, largely unexplored with few permanent settlements.
regions.significance: Sparse stellar density, research stations, deep space monitoring

regions.name: Spinward Crescent
regions.description: Arc-shaped region extending spinward from the core, site of rapid industrial development.
regions.significance: Industrial development corridor, manufacturing centers, trade routes

regions.name: Anti-Spinward Reach
regions.description: Extended region opposite to galactic rotation, featuring established colonies and defensive positions.
regions.significance: Defensive perimeter, established colonies, strategic buffer zone
